summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Amdraipt timetable generation system. All core features working correctly including entity management, DSA-powered timetable generation, and UI interactions.
passed_tests: All CRUD operations for teachers, subjects, rooms, timeslots (19/19 backend tests passed)
Timetable generation using DSA algorithms (Graph Coloring + Greedy + Backtracking)
Frontend tab navigation and form submissions
Entity management with real-time stat card updates
Timetable grid visualization with subject, teacher, and room display
Form validation with error toast notifications

success_percentage.integration: 100% (seamless data flow between frontend and backend)
